channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom for Linux clients
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom for Linux clients

item.title: CVE-2023-28598|2024-08-02T13:43:22.564Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20linux%20clients
item.description: Zoom for Linux clients prior to 5.13.10 contain an HTML injection vulnerability. If a victim starts a chat with a malicious user it could result in a Zoom application crash.
